amendment.description: To increase, with an offset, by $1,582,700,000 over fiscal years 2006 through 2010 funding for Transportation (budget function 400) with the amount of the increase intended to be allocated to the Vehicle Systems account of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration for subsonic and hypersonic aeronautics research.

action.text: Amendment SA 197 proposed by Senator Allen.
Proposed amendment SA 197 withdrawn in Senate.
